Articles.Content:
Howdy Folks,

I've got about 50 hours into Kerbal and finally decided to tackle the last thing that I was having trouble with. Building a simple, easy to fly jet that will take time acceleration. So, I present the Surface Explorer Mk II. 

  • Decent range
  • Easy to fly
  • Lots of control surface
  • Super easy to take off
  • Occasionally blows up when it gets a tiny pebble on the surface of the runway
  • Parachutes!

Anywho folks. I'd love feedback.

Happy flying,

Howard
